   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(maybe_SUITE).
   22: -feature(maybe_expr, enable).
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: 
   25: -export([all/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   26:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: -export([basic/1, nested/1, in_try_catch/1]).
   28: 
   29: all() ->
   30:     [{group,p}].
   31: 
   32: groups() ->
   33:     [{p,[parallel],
   34:       [basic,nested,in_try_catch]}].
   35: 
   36: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   37:     test_lib:interpret(?MODULE),
   38:     Config.
   39: 
   40: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   41:     ok.
   42: 
   43: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   44:     test_lib:interpret(?MODULE),
   45:     true = lists:member(?MODULE, int:interpreted()),
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   49:     ok.
   50: 
   51: -record(value, {v}).
   52: 
   53: basic(_Config) ->
   54:     {ok,42,fish} = basic_1(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {ok,fish}}),
   55:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {error,whatever}}),
   56:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => error}),
   57:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => error}),
   58:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => {error,whatever}}),
   59:     some_value = basic_1(0, #{0 => #value{v=some_value}}),
   60:     {'EXIT',{{else_clause,something_wrong},[_|_]}} = catch basic_1(0, #{0 => something_wrong}),
   61: 
   62:     {ok,life,"universe",everything} = basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   63:                                                    life => "universe",
   64:                                                    "universe" => {ok,everything}}),
   65:     error = basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   66:                          life => "universe",
   67:                          "universe" => error}),
   68:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,not_a_list},[_|_]}} = catch basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   69:                                                                 life => not_a_list}),
   70:     {'EXIT',{{else_clause,not_ok},[_|_]}} = catch basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   71:                                                                life => "universe",
   72:                                                                "universe" => not_ok}),
   73:     {'EXIT',{{else_clause,not_ok},[_|_]}} = catch basic_2(0, #{0 => not_ok}),
   74: 
   75:     {ok,42,fish,dolphins} = basic_3(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {ok,fish},
   76:                                          fish => {ok,#value{v=dolphins}}}),
   77:     {error,whatever} = basic_3(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {error,whatever}}),
   78:     failed = basic_3(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => failed}),
   79:     failed_early = basic_3(0, #{0 => failed_early}),
   80: 
   81:     y = maybe nomatch ?= id(x) else _ -> y end,
   82:     y = maybe nomatch ?= id(x) else _ -> x, y end,
   83: 
   84:     x = maybe nomatch ?= id(x) else E1 -> E1 end,
   85: 
   86:     6 = maybe X1 = 2+2, X1+2 end,
   87:     6 = maybe X2 = 2+2, X2+2 else {error, T} -> T end,
   88:     {"llo", "hello", "hello"} = maybe Y1 = "he"++X3=Z1 ?= "hello", {X3,Y1,Z1} end,
   89:     {"llo", "hello", "llo"} = maybe Y2 = "he"++(X4=Z2) ?= "hello", {X4,Y2,Z2} end,
   90: 
   91:     whatever = maybe
   92:                    AlwaysMatching ?= id(whatever),
   93:                    AlwaysMatching
   94:                else
   95:                    E2 -> E2
   96:                end,
   97: 
   98:     <<0>> = basic_4(id({<<0>>})),
   99: 
  100:     ok.
  101: 
  102: basic_1(V0, M) ->
  103:     Res = basic_1a(V0, M),
  104:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_1b(V0, M),
  105:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_1c(V0, M),
  106:     Res.
  107: 
  108: basic_1a(V0, M) ->
  109:     maybe
  110:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  111:         {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  112:         {ok,V1,V2}
  113:     else
  114:         {error,_} ->
  115:             error;
  116:         error ->
  117:             error;
  118:         #value{v=V} ->
  119:             V
  120:     end.
  121: 
  122: basic_1b(V0, M) ->
  123:     Result =
  124:         maybe
  125:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  126:             {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  127:             {ok,V1,V2}
  128:         else
  129:             {error,_} ->
  130:                 error;
  131:             error ->
  132:                 error;
  133:             #value{v=V} ->
  134:                 V
  135:         end,
  136:     {wrapped,Result}.
  137: 
  138: basic_1c(V0, M) ->
  139:     OK = id(ok),
  140:     Error = id(error),
  141:     Result =
  142:         maybe
  143:             {OK,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  144:             {OK,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  145:             {OK,V1,V2}
  146:         else
  147:             {Error,_} ->
  148:                 Error;
  149:             Error ->
  150:                 Error;
  151:             #value{v=V} ->
  152:                 V
  153:         end,
  154:     {wrapped,Result}.
  155: 
  156: basic_2(V0, M) ->
  157:     Res = basic_2a(V0, M),
  158:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_2b(V0, M),
  159:     Res.
  160: 
  161: basic_2a(V0, M) ->
  162:     maybe
  163:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  164:         V2 = [_|_] = do_something(V1, M),
  165:         {ok,V3} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  166:         {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  167:     else
  168:         {error,_} ->
  169:             error;
  170:         error ->
  171:             error;
  172:         #value{v=V} ->
  173:             V
  174:     end.
  175: 
  176: basic_2b(V0, M) ->
  177:     Result =
  178:         maybe
  179:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  180:             V2 = [_|_] = do_something(V1, M),
  181:             {ok,V3} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  182:             {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  183:         else
  184:             {error,_} ->
  185:                 error;
  186:             error ->
  187:                 error;
  188:             #value{v=V} ->
  189:                 V
  190:         end,
  191:     _ = id(0),
  192:     {wrapped,Result}.
  193: 
  194: basic_3(V0, M) ->
  195:     Res = basic_3a(V0, M),
  196:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_3b(V0, M),
  197:     Res.
  198: 
  199: basic_3a(V0, M) ->
  200:     maybe
  201:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  202:         {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  203:         {ok,#value{v=V3}} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  204:         {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  205:     end.
  206: 
  207: basic_3b(V0, M) ->
  208:     Result =
  209:         maybe
  210:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  211:             {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  212:             {ok,#value{v=V3}} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  213:             {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  214:         end,
  215:     {wrapped,Result}.
  216: 
  217: basic_4({X}) ->
  218:     maybe
  219:         <<_:(ok)>> ?= X
  220:     end.
  221: 
  222: nested(_Config) ->
  223:     {outer_fail,not_ok} = nested_1(0, #{0 => not_ok}),
  224:     {x,{error,inner}} = nested_1(0, #{0 => {ok,x}, x => {error,inner}}),
  225:     {outer_fail,{unexpected,not_error}} = nested_1(0, #{0 => {ok,x}, x => not_error}),
  226:     ok.
  227: 
  228: nested_1(V0, M) ->
  229:     Res = nested_1a(V0, M),
  230:     {wrapped,Res} = nested_1b(V0, M),
  231:     {wrapped,Res} = nested_1c(V0, M),
  232:     Res.
  233: 
  234: nested_1a(V0, M) ->
  235:     maybe
  236:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  237:         V2 = {error,_} ?=
  238:             maybe
  239:                 {error, _} ?= id(do_something(V1, M))
  240:             else
  241:                 Unexpected -> {unexpected, Unexpected}
  242:             end,
  243:         {V1,V2}
  244:     else
  245:         Res -> {outer_fail,Res}
  246:     end.
  247: 
  248: nested_1b(V0, M) ->
  249:     Result =
  250:         maybe
  251:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  252:             V2 = {error,_} ?=
  253:                 maybe
  254:                     {error, _} ?= id(do_something(V1, M))
  255:                 else
  256:                     Unexpected -> {unexpected, Unexpected}
  257:                 end,
  258:             {V1,V2}
  259:         else
  260:             Res -> {outer_fail,Res}
  261:         end,
  262:     {wrapped,Result}.
  263: 
  264: nested_1c(V0, M) ->
  265:     Result =
  266:         maybe
  267:             R ?= maybe
  268:                      {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  269:                      {error,_} = V2 ?=
  270:                          maybe
  271:                              {error, _} ?= id(do_something(V1, M))
  272:                          else
  273:                              Unexpected -> {unexpected, Unexpected}
  274:                          end,
  275:                      {V1,V2}
  276:                  else
  277:                      Res -> {outer_fail,Res}
  278:                  end,
  279:             R
  280:         else
  281:             Var -> Var
  282:         end,
  283:     {wrapped,Result}.
  284: 
  285: in_try_catch(_Config) ->
  286:     Ref = make_ref(),
  287:     try
  288:         in_try_catch_1(Ref),
  289:         ct:failed(should_not_succeed)
  290:     catch
  291:         {bad_maybe_match,Ref} ->
  292:             ok
  293:     end.
  294: 
  295: in_try_catch_1(Ref) ->
  296:     maybe
  297:         throw({bad_maybe_match,Ref})
  298:     end.
  299: 
  300: %% Utility functions.
  301: 
  302: do_something(V, M) ->
  303:     map_get(id(V), M).
  304: 
  305: id(X) -> X.
